title: Heroes & Husbands
description: Roses are red, violets are blueThere’s a Best Friend’s SisterAnd an Office Crush, too!This Valentine’s Day, fall in love with the intertwined stories of two couples from “Finding a Husband” that readers couldn’t help wondering about! Jake’s sister Healey and his best friend, Tim—and Molly’s coworkers Vijay and Shannon—were finding each other on the sidelines of Jake and Molly’s romance. Now you can discover how one night’s events brought these two pairs together, only in this special holiday short story!Roses are red, violets are blueThey fell in love, and you will too![Heroes & Husbands is contemporary romance short story of approximately 60 pages. While it can be read as a standalone, it is best enjoyed after reading “Finding a Husband”.]
author: Kristen Casey
